golconda.image.compute_binedges(bincenters)[source]

Compute bin edges from bin centers.

Parameters:

bincenters (numpy.ndarray) – Array of bin centers.

Returns:

Array of bin edges.

Return type:

numpy.ndarray

Apply a Gaussian taper to prevent high-k noise amplification.
